baseUrl.title: Website URL
baseUrl.description: The URL to crawl. Only pages in the sub-directory will be probed.

maxPages.title: Max pages
maxPages.description: The maximum number of pages that will be crawled. If empty, the number is not limited.

maxConcurrency.title: Max concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: The maximum number of pages to crawl in parallel. Higher values = faster but more load on target server.

saveOnlyBrokenLinks.title: Save only broken links
saveOnlyBrokenLinks.description: If true, only broken links will be saved to the dataset. If false, all links are saved.

crawlSubdomains.title: Crawl subdomains
crawlSubdomains.description: If true, the actor will also crawl subdomains of the base URL.

notificationEmails.title: Notification emails
notificationEmails.description: Add email addresses to receive notifications when broken links are found.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for avoiding IP blocks. Recommended for large crawls.
